content:
Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Natalia Kalmykova held a working meeting with representatives of Protez Foundation on the development of a system of access to prosthetics of servicemen of the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

She is about itwroteIn his Facebook.

"We have agreed to consolidate work relations, so we will soon sign documents about cooperation," the post reads.

She stressed that today it is necessary to create conditions for creating a comprehensive system of assistance to the military, which would include further support and psychological support.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Ministry of DefenseIntroducesA new form of study and the procedure for obtaining officers for mobilized physicians.
title: The Ministry of Defense announced cooperation with representatives of the Protez Foundation
description: She wrote about it in her Facebook. “They agreed to consolidate work relationships, ...
author: Army Inform
